EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance for the BIG Sleepout!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Want to reunite with NCS friends? Have fun? Experience what homelessness might be like?
Do so in a safe and fun way with The BIG Sleepout. It's taking place on Friday 4th-Saturday 5th March.
Sign up closes at midday on Weds 24th Feb! For more details and to sign up click here
Get a taste of last years Sleepout with their video.
You don't have to do anything if you have signed up already, but if you haven't yet, get a move on!
Have a great evening,
From Jade and The Black Country Youth Board
